org.xadisk.additional
Class XAFileInputStreamWrapper

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      org.xadisk.additional.XAFileInputStreamWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable
public class XAFileInputStreamWrapper
extends InputStream

This class acts as a wrapper around the XAFileInputStream for the purpose of providing the standard InputStream implementation (because XAFileInputStream itself does not extend the InputStream).

Since:
1.0

Constructor Summary
XAFileInputStreamWrapper(XAFileInputStream xis)
          The sole constructor which takes the XAFileInputStream to be wrapped.
